adept: Represents training, discipline, and tactical growth. Adept essence users steadily refine techniques and turn simple actions into precise, reliable power. Their abilities often enhance fundamentals or improve consistency during combat.
ape: A primal essence of strength, ferocity, and raw instinct. Ape users excel in overwhelming force and untamed momentum. Their abilities favor physical aggression and relentless strikes.
air: An essence of speed, lightness, and movement. Air users manipulate wind currents and rapid shifts in position. Their powers emphasize evasion, quick attacks, and flowing mobility.
armour: Embodies defense, protection, and resilience. Armour users reinforce themselves and others with hardened barriers. Their abilities emphasize damage reduction, fortification, and enduring blows.
axe: A brutal essence of cleaving power and decisive blows. Axe users specialize in high-impact attacks that break guards and split defenses. Their abilities embody raw lethality and decisive aggression.
bat: Represents nocturnal senses, agility, and elusive movement. Bat essence users excel in blindsiding foes and navigating darkness. Their abilities often use sound, stealth, or evasion.
bear: An essence of endurance, ferocity, and brute force. Bear users unleash crushing power while withstanding massive punishment. Their abilities emphasize tenacity, grapples, and overwhelming might.
bee: An essence of precision, teamwork, and sudden stings of power. Bee users strike quickly, often in flurries or coordinated bursts. Their abilities emphasize targeted attacks, swarming tactics, and poison delivery.
bird: Represents freedom, speed, and skyborne perception. Bird users gain heightened vantage, agility, and rapid maneuvering. Their powers focus on flight-like movement, sweeping strikes, and aerial control.
bow: An essence of range, finesse, and pinpoint accuracy. Bow users strike from afar with deadly precision and tactical positioning. Their abilities emphasize critical hits, long-range pressure, and mobility.
cage: Embodies confinement, restraint, and tactical control. Cage essence users excel in trapping enemies, limiting movement, or forcing confrontations. Their powers revolve around boundaries, zones, and restriction.
cat: An essence of stealth, grace, and predatory instincts. Cat users rely on agility and opportunistic strikes. Their abilities reward speed, cunning positioning, and well-timed pounces.
cattle: Represents endurance, stability, and herd-like cooperation. Cattle users draw on steady strength and defensive bulk. Their powers emphasize persistence, support, and shared resilience.
chain: An essence of restraint, binding, and forced connection. Chain users manipulate links—literal or metaphorical—to control or restrict foes. Their abilities often immobilize, pull, or ensnare targets.
cloth: Embodies flexibility, subtlety, and light, adaptable defenses. Cloth users blend protection with freedom of movement. Their abilities often manipulate wraps, threads, or layered techniques.
coral: A marine essence of growth, structure, and hidden sharpness. Coral users blend beauty with danger, forming natural armor or spiked formations. Their powers emphasize defense, delayed retaliation, and environmental shaping.
crocodile: Represents ambush predation, armored hides, and crushing bites. Crocodile users excel at sudden assaults from advantageous positions. Their abilities emphasize grapples, burst damage, and stubborn durability.
deer: An essence of grace, speed, and heightened awareness. Deer users excel in evasive maneuvers, support, and nature-guided intuition. Their abilities enhance mobility and reactive movement.
dog: Embodies loyalty, teamwork, and determination. Dog users excel in coordinated strikes and protective actions. Their abilities reward cooperation, vigilance, and unwavering pursuit.
duck: A surprisingly versatile essence of adaptability, buoyancy, and unexpected resilience. Duck users thrive in chaotic environments, slipping through danger with ease. Their abilities emphasize flexibility, water-affinity tricks, and comedic misdirection.
earth: An essence of stability, endurance, and raw elemental force. Earth users draw strength from the ground, creating barriers and powerful strikes. Their abilities emphasize defense, fortification, and unyielding physical presence.
eye: Represents perception, foresight, and hidden insight. Eye users excel at reading opponents and detecting weaknesses. Their abilities often reveal information, expose vulnerabilities, or enhance precision.
feast: An essence of abundance, excess, and the cycle of consumption. Feast users channel overwhelming energy drawn from devouring or absorbing. Their abilities emphasize replenishment, empowerment through intake, and overwhelming surges.
fire: Embodies destruction, passion, and volatile power. Fire users unleash explosive attacks and continuous burning pressure. Their abilities focus on direct damage, area effects, and escalating intensity.
fish: Represents fluidity, adaptation, and underwater survival. Fish users excel in movement through difficult environments and slippery evasion. Their abilities emphasize flow, escape, and water-based techniques.
flea: An essence of speed, irritation, and small-but-relentless aggression. Flea users strike rapidly and unpredictably. Their abilities emphasize rapid movement, persistent harassment, and hard-to-track attacks.
foot: Embodies movement, stability, and the power behind every step. Foot users enhance running, dodging, and physical technique. Their abilities emphasize mobility, grounded strength, and forced repositioning.
fork: Represents division, choice, and branching paths. Fork users manipulate outcomes, creating splits or alternative effects. Their abilities emphasize disruption, multi-hit attacks, and turning decisions into power.
fox: An essence of cunning, agility, and clever trickery. Fox users rely on deception and swift strikes. Their abilities emphasize misdirection, illusions, and opportunistic attacks.
frog: Embodies leaping power, adaptability, and swamp-born resilience. Frog users excel in ambush movement and sticky terrain control. Their abilities emphasize jumps, grapples, and environment-based disruption.
fungus: Represents decay, spread, and quiet persistence. Fungus users create lingering hazards, spores, and creeping influence. Their abilities emphasize attrition, infection, and slow-building power.
goat: An essence of stubbornness, balance, and headlong charge. Goat users combine sure-footed defense with powerful bursts of force. Their abilities emphasize impact, persistence, and terrain advantage.
grazen: Represents wild foraging, calm presence, and cyclical renewal. Grazen users gain strength from natural abundance and peaceful endurance. Their abilities emphasize healing, restoration, and sustainable power.
gun: Embodies modern force, precision, and explosive projection. Gun users strike from range with sudden, controlled bursts. Their abilities emphasize rapid fire, piercing shots, and mechanical efficiency.
hair: An essence of growth, manipulation, and unexpected strength. Hair users extend and shape strands like living weapons or shields. Their abilities emphasize entangling, binding, and adaptive reach.
hammer: Represents impact, authority, and crushing power. Hammer users deliver devastating blows that break defenses. Their abilities emphasize stun effects, structural destruction, and overwhelming might.
hand: Embodies craftsmanship, dexterity, and direct action. Hand users excel in tasks requiring precision or physical technique. Their abilities emphasize manipulation, grapples, and finely controlled strikes.
heidel: An essence tied to heritage, discipline, and traditional strength. Heidel users draw upon ancestral techniques and structured combat forms. Their abilities emphasize heritage-based boosts, disciplined strikes, and ritual empowerment.
hook: Represents pulling force, capture, and forced engagement. Hook users excel at dragging foes into danger or repositioning them. Their abilities emphasize disruption, forced movement, and battlefield manipulation.
horse: Embodies speed, stamina, and relentless forward momentum. Horse users excel at charge attacks and long-distance movement. Their abilities emphasize acceleration, mobility, and overwhelming rushes.
hunt: An essence of pursuit, instinct, and precision stalking. Hunt users excel at tracking prey and exploiting opening strikes. Their abilities emphasize ambush, focus, and relentless chase.
iron: Represents durability, discipline, and uncompromising strength. Iron users take hits others cannot and return force with heavier force. Their abilities emphasize defense, blunt power, and resistance to harm.
knife: An essence of sharp precision, quick strikes, and lethal closeness. Knife users excel in critical hits and rapid, cutting attacks. Their abilities emphasize bleed effects, flanking, and targeted damage.
lizard: Embodies regeneration, scaling resilience, and evasive movement. Lizard users shed harm and slip out of danger. Their abilities emphasize healing, camouflage, and sudden bursts of agility.
locust: Represents consumption, swarming force, and devastating spread. Locust users overwhelm foes through numbers or aggressive replication. Their abilities emphasize rapid strikes, area disruption, and relentless pressure.
magic: An essence of arcane force, manipulation, and boundless potential. Magic users shape raw power into a variety of effects. Their abilities emphasize versatility, spell-like attacks, and mystical influence.
manatee: Embodies calm strength, buoyant endurance, and gentle power. Manatee users absorb hits with surprising resilience and respond with stable force. Their abilities emphasize defense, water affinity, and steady protection.
might: Represents raw physical power, dominance, and overwhelming force. Might users excel in strength-based attacks and forceful presence. Their abilities emphasize crushing blows, intimidation, and direct confrontation.
monkey: An essence of agility, mischief, and improvisation. Monkey users leap unpredictably and use their environment creatively. Their abilities emphasize disruption, trickery, and unconventional attacks.
mouse: Embodies subtlety, small size, and unexpected escape. Mouse users slip into spaces others cannot and evade deadly threats. Their abilities emphasize stealth, survival, and surprising precision.
needle: Represents exactness, piercing finesse, and delicate but deadly strikes. Needle users deliver pinpoint attacks that ignore defenses. Their abilities emphasize precision, debilitation, and surgical technique.
net: An essence of entanglement, capture, and battlefield hindrance. Net users control spaces by slowing, trapping, or restraining foes. Their abilities emphasize immobilization, area control, and tactical restriction.
octopus: Embodies flexibility, reach, and multi-directional movement. Octopus users grapple, bind, and manipulate the field with many angles of attack. Their abilities emphasize control, multitarget effects, and adaptability.
pangolin: Represents natural armor, curling defense, and surprising bursts of action. Pangolin users endure punishment through hardened plates and retaliate decisively. Their abilities emphasize protection, counterattacks, and resilience.
paper: An essence of inscription, flexibility, and knowledge made physical. Paper users create constructs, seals, and animated pages. Their abilities emphasize creation, manipulation, and ritual shapes of power.
plant: Embodies growth, entanglement, and nature’s slow but certain force. Plant users root enemies in place or draw nourishment from the environment. Their abilities emphasize healing, immobilization, and steady, natural power.
rabbit: Represents agility, alertness, and explosive bursts of speed. Rabbit users dart unpredictably, avoiding danger and striking with surprise. Their abilities emphasize mobility, evasion, and reflex-driven boosts.
rake: An essence of sweeping strikes, agricultural motion, and clearing force. Rake users control space with broad, rhythmic movements. Their abilities emphasize area attacks, disruption, and directional control.
rat: Embodies survival, scavenging, and persistence against all odds. Rat users endure adversity and spread debilitating effects. Their abilities emphasize attrition, disease, and tenacious harassment.
sceptre: Represents authority, command, and focused channeling of power. Sceptre users amplify magic or enforce influence over others. Their abilities emphasize buffs, leadership effects, and empowered casting.
shark: An essence of predatory focus, relentless momentum, and blood-scent instinct. Shark users strike with overwhelming force once they lock onto a target. Their abilities emphasize pursuit, critical blows, and finishing weakened foes.
shield: Embodies stalwart defense, protection, and steadfast resolve. Shield users create barriers and safeguard allies from harm. Their abilities emphasize blocking, redirecting attacks, and reinforcing durability.
ship: Represents travel, navigation, and endurance across long journeys. Ship users excel in movement, weathering hardship, and adapting to shifting conditions. Their abilities emphasize momentum, environmental resistance, and long-term stamina.
shovel: An essence of digging, unearthing, and buried power. Shovel users manipulate terrain or uncover hidden strength beneath the surface. Their abilities emphasize ground control, excavation bursts, and surprising strikes from below.
sickle: Embodies harvesting, sweeping arcs, and decisive cutting motions. Sickle users specialize in circular slashes that carve through groups. Their abilities emphasize bleed effects, reaping motions, and area-cleaving attacks.
skunk: Represents defense through irritation, stench, and repulsion. Skunk users create noxious zones or drive enemies back. Their abilities emphasize deterrence, status effects, and chaotic battlefield control.
sloth: An essence of patience, stillness, and delayed but unstoppable force. Sloth users endure while building power over time. Their abilities emphasize slow stacking abilities, counters, and outlasting opponents.
snake: Embodies poison, cunning strikes, and coiled readiness. Snake users deliver precise, venomous attacks and sudden movements. Their abilities emphasize toxins, constriction, and swift counterstrikes.
spear: Represents long reach, piercing precision, and versatile stance work. Spear users strike from safe distance while controlling engagements. Their abilities emphasize thrusts, zonal control, and flexible positioning.
spider: Embodies traps, webs, and patient entanglement. Spider users immobilize foes and strike when enemies are vulnerable. Their abilities emphasize binding, poison, and layered battlefield control.
spike: An essence of sudden force, piercing impact, and brutal angular power. Spike users deliver sharp, high-impact attacks that break armor. Their abilities emphasize penetration, burst damage, and sharp defensive counters.
staff: Represents channeling, balance, and extended technique. Staff users combine striking reach with controlled motions. Their abilities emphasize multipurpose attacks, defense, and magical channeling.
swift: Embodies rapid acceleration, instantaneous action, and sudden bursts of speed. Swift users outpace opponents and act before threats form. Their abilities emphasize turn manipulation, evasion, and fast combo attacks.
sword: An essence of mastery, precision, and adaptable forms. Sword users perform clean, decisive strikes in fluid patterns. Their abilities emphasize versatility, critical hits, and disciplined technique.
technology: Represents innovation, mechanical efficiency, and engineered solutions. Technology users enhance their combat with devices, tools, or automation. Their abilities emphasize gadgets, ranged support, and utility effects.
thread: Embodies connection, weaving, and delicate but powerful control. Thread users link targets or bind fates through fine manipulation. Their abilities emphasize stitching effects, multi-target control, and subtle direction changes.
tooth: Represents primal aggression, biting force, and predatory instinct. Tooth users excel at savage close combat and raw ferocity. Their abilities emphasize flurries, grapples, and bleed-heavy attacks.
trap: An essence of foresight, preparation, and punishing missteps. Trap users structure the battlefield so enemies suffer for every move. Their abilities emphasize triggered effects, immobilization, and area denial.
tree: Embodies growth, stability, and deep-rooted endurance. Tree users call on nature’s patience to heal, shield, or anchor combat. Their abilities emphasize regeneration, protective barriers, and earth-linked power.
trowel: Represents cultivation, precise shaping, and tending the environment. Trowel users subtly influence terrain or encourage growth. Their abilities emphasize structure, support, and battlefield gardening.
turtle: An essence of defense, patience, and grounded stability. Turtle users endure overwhelming force while advancing at their own pace. Their abilities emphasize damage reduction, protective shells, and slow but unstoppable momentum.
vehicle: Represents momentum, transport, and mechanical movement. Vehicle users accelerate rapidly and carry power forward with force. Their abilities emphasize charge attacks, collision effects, and sustained speed.
wasp: Embodies piercing aggression, venom, and rapid, darting motion. Wasp users strike fast and retreat before retaliation. Their abilities emphasize poison bursts, hit-and-run tactics, and precision stings.
water: An essence of flow, adaptability, and overwhelming force through persistence. Water users shift seamlessly between offense and defense. Their abilities emphasize fluid motion, healing, and crushing pressure.
whale: Represents immense mass, deep resilience, and resonant power. Whale users unleash vast, tidal impacts and echoing force. Their abilities emphasize shockwaves, endurance, and underwater might.
wheel: Embodies rotation, cyclical power, and unstoppable continuous motion. Wheel users maintain momentum that grows stronger the longer they act. Their abilities emphasize spinning strikes, circular barriers, and repeating effects.
whip: Represents flexible reach, snap-force impact, and flowing control. Whip users manipulate mid-range space and reposition enemies. Their abilities emphasize disarms, lash combos, and sweeping arcs.
wind: An essence of movement, freedom, and invisible force. Wind users excel at evasion, high mobility, and slicing currents. Their abilities emphasize knockback, speed boosts, and precision air-blades.
wolf: Embodies pack tactics, predatory instinct, and loyalty. Wolf users excel in coordinated attacks and sensing danger. Their abilities emphasize teamwork bonuses, feral strikes, and perseverance.
brush: Represents artistic flow, strokes of creation, and shaping reality through expression. Brush users manifest power like ink on canvas. Their abilities emphasize illusions, markings, and form-shaping bursts.
feeble: An essence of subtle weakness, fragility, and deceptive vulnerability. Feeble users twist perceived weakness into unexpected advantage. Their abilities emphasize debuffs, misdirection, and survival by improbability.
lurker: Embodies stealth, ambush, and unseen hunger. Lurker users strike from shadows and vanish instantly. Their abilities emphasize invisibility, pounce attacks, and fear through uncertainty.
wood: Represents structure, natural construction, and living architecture. Wood users grow barriers or create tools from organic material. Their abilities emphasize shaping branches, protection, and sturdy growth.
balance: An essence of harmony, symmetry, and controlled equilibrium. Balance users stabilize the battlefield and correct distortions. Their abilities emphasize counters, flow regulation, and duality effects.
blood: Embodies vitality, sacrifice, and power drawn from living essence. Blood users trade their own life or others’ for dramatic effects. Their abilities emphasize lifesteal, overflow strength, and volatile surges.
bone: Represents structure, rigidity, and the remnants of life. Bone users reshape skeletal forms for offense or defense. Their abilities emphasize armor, piercing attacks, and resilient constructs.
claw: Embodies tearing force, animal ferocity, and instinctive aggression. Claw users favor slashes and grapple-based tactics. Their abilities emphasize shredding armor, rending blows, and persistent pressure.
cloud: Represents drifting forms, concealment, and dispersed power. Cloud users obscure themselves or shift shape in vaporous form. Their abilities emphasize illusions, evasion, and sudden stormbursts.
cold: An essence of stillness, freezing power, and suppressive force. Cold users slow enemies and infuse attacks with chilling precision. Their abilities emphasize frostbite, immobilization, and numbing control.
dance: Embodies movement as expression, rhythm, and fluid combat form. Dance users weave between blows with grace. Their abilities emphasize motion-based attacks, reactive counters, and dramatic flourishes.
dark: Represents shadows, fear, and corrupted illumination. Dark users manipulate absence and negative space. Their abilities emphasize shadow binding, fear auras, and consuming force.
death: An essence of endings, decay, and inevitable stillness. Death users channel entropy into devastating effects. Their abilities emphasize curses, life-drain, and finality.
dust: Represents dryness, erosion, and ancient remnants. Dust users dissolve matter or blind foes with swirling particles. Their abilities emphasize decay, concealment clouds, and brittle barriers.
flesh: Embodies organic growth, muscle morphing, and adaptive mutation. Flesh users reshape their own bodies for power. Their abilities emphasize regeneration, transformation, and brutal close combat.
glass: Represents fragility and sharp precision, both delicate and deadly. Glass users create cutting shards or reflective barriers. Their abilities emphasize countercuts, refracted attacks, and brittle explosions.
growth: An essence of expansion, potential, and natural progression. Growth users multiply effects over time. Their abilities emphasize stacking boons, overgrowth attacks, and rapid escalation.
ice: Embodies frozen stillness, crystalline beauty, and precise control. Ice users craft structures or strike with chilling force. Their abilities emphasize freezing, hard barriers, and sharp frost blasts.
knowledge: Represents understanding, logic, and strategic insight. Knowledge users gain power through study and pattern recognition. Their abilities emphasize prediction, analysis, and memory-based advantage.
life: An essence of vitality, renewal, and continuous energy. Life users heal, accelerate growth, or bolster resilience. Their abilities emphasize regeneration, cleansing, and protective force.
light: Represents clarity, illumination, and radiant power. Light users blind foes or empower allies with brilliance. Their abilities emphasize beams, purifying effects, and defensive radiance.
lightning: Embodies sudden impact, speed, and chaotic energy. Lightning users strike faster than reaction. Their abilities emphasize shock, chain attacks, and mobility bursts.
mirror: Represents reflection, duplication, and imitation. Mirror users copy abilities, redirect attacks, or split their form. Their abilities emphasize clones, reversals, and mirrored space.
pure: Embodies cleansing, perfection, and uncorrupted force. Pure users nullify impurities and reinforce ideal forms. Their abilities emphasize healing, purification, and radiant bursts.
sand: Represents erosion, shifting terrain, and gritty pressure. Sand users smother foes or reshape dunes as weapons. Their abilities emphasize suffocation, shaping, and grinding control.
smoke: An essence of obscurity, choking force, and drifting deception. Smoke users vanish into fumes or overwhelm with toxic haze. Their abilities emphasize stealth, blinds, and combustive clouds.
song: Embodies resonance, vibration, and emotional influence. Song users channel power through melody or rhythm. Their abilities emphasize buffs, debuffs, and sonic strikes.
venom: Represents toxin, corruption, and degrading strength. Venom users weaken foes over time with deadly compounds. Their abilities emphasize stacking poison, debilitating bites, and corrosive sprays.
crystal: Embodies clarity, structure, and refracted energy. Crystal users channel stable power through rigid forms. Their abilities emphasize shields, beams, and crystallization effects.
deep: Represents abyssal pressure, darkness, and hidden enormity. Deep users invoke oceanic force and crushing stillness. Their abilities emphasize pressure waves, concealment, and vast resilience.
echo: Embodies repetition, lingering memory, and harmonic aftereffects. Echo users cause abilities to trigger twice or create delayed bursts. Their abilities emphasize rebounds, duplications, and haunting resonance.
gathering: Represents collection, convergence, and accumulation. Gathering users pull resources, power, or enemies toward a focal point. Their abilities emphasize synergy, hoarding force, and multipliers.
hunger: Embodies consuming desire, emptiness, and devouring force. Hunger users drain energy from foes or grow stronger through consumption. Their abilities emphasize absorption, leeching, and ravenous bursts.
moon: Represents cycles, reflection, and shifting power. Moon users change strength depending on time, phase, or state. Their abilities emphasize illusions, tides of power, and cycle-based buffs.
resolute: Embodies determination, unwavering focus, and inner strength. Resolute users resist control and persist through adversity. Their abilities emphasize resolve buffs, immunity windows, and will-forged power.
serene: Represents calm, clarity, and peaceful force. Serene users stabilize the battlefield or soothe conflict. Their abilities emphasize tranquility, defensive calm, and gentle but potent effects.
star: Embodies cosmic brilliance, distant might, and celestial influence. Star users unleash radiant bursts or gravitational cuts. Their abilities emphasize stellar beams, destiny, and long-range strikes.
sun: Represents heat, radiance, and overwhelming illumination. Sun users scorch enemies or energize allies. Their abilities emphasize burning auras, healing light, and solar blasts.
zeal: Embodies devotion, fiery conviction, and unstoppable pursuit. Zeal users gain power through passion and purpose. Their abilities emphasize escalating attacks, burning faith, and righteous strikes.
corrupt: An essence of decay, mutation, and unstable power. Corrupt users twist the battlefield with hazardous influence. Their abilities emphasize degeneration, contagion, and strength gained through impurity.
discord: Embodies chaos, dissonance, and disruptive interference. Discord users unravel coordination and magnify conflict. Their abilities emphasize confusion, backlash effects, and erratic power surges.
elemental: Represents primal forces of nature in unified expression. Elemental users call upon multiple elements simultaneously. Their abilities emphasize hybrid attacks, shifting forms, and adaptive elemental transitions.
harmonic: Embodies resonance, synchronized power, and perfect alignment. Harmonic users amplify allies or abilities through shared frequency. Their abilities emphasize multi-target synergy, dual effects, and crescendo bursts.
malign: Represents sinister intent, malevolent energy, and creeping dread. Malign users warp emotions and weaken resolve. Their abilities emphasize curses, aura pressure, and fear-driven control.
omen: Embodies forewarning, fate-marking, and subtle doom. Omen users tag targets with destiny-bound effects. Their abilities emphasize prophetic strikes, delayed triggers, and inevitability.
potent: Represents raw strength, concentrated impact, and overwhelming force. Potent users enhance any action with magnified output. Their abilities emphasize empowered hits, condensed energy blasts, and force multipliers.
renewal: Embodies rebirth, restoration, and cyclical healing. Renewal users recover quickly and provide powerful sustain. Their abilities emphasize regeneration, cleanse mechanics, and revival-like surges.
rune: Represents ancient symbols, metaphysical scripting, and encoded power. Rune users inscribe energy patterns that shape reality. Their abilities emphasize wards, glyph traps, and activated sigils.
shimmer: Embodies luminescent distortion, reflective trickery, and illusionary beauty. Shimmer users dazzle, mislead, or refract force. Their abilities emphasize blinding bursts, mirage effects, and shifting protection.
tentacle: Represents grasping limbs, abyssal reach, and oppressive restraint. Tentacle users control space with extending force. Their abilities emphasize binding, grappling, and multi-directional attacks.
wing: Embodies ascension, freedom of movement, and aerial supremacy. Wing users glide through combat and strike from above. Their abilities emphasize soaring mobility, sweeping arcs, and wind-backed power.
dimension: Represents altered space, folded reality, and spatial manipulation. Dimension users bend distances, reposition foes, or create pockets of warped terrain. Their abilities emphasize teleportation, distortion, and impossible geometry.
myriad: Embodies multiplicity, variation, and unfathomable diversity. Myriad users generate countless forms or effects. Their abilities emphasize multiform attacks, unpredictable patterns, and overwhelming variety.
sin: Represents forbidden impulse, moral corruption, and power driven by vice. Sin users channel destructive emotion for strength. Their abilities emphasize temptation, explosive outbursts, and self-damaging power.
vast: Embodies enormity, deep cosmos, and overwhelming scale. Vast users draw upon nearly limitless magnitude to crush opposition. Their abilities emphasize massive area effects, gravity force, and titanic presence.
visage: Represents appearance, identity, and psychological projection. Visage users alter faces, perceptions, or emotional interpretation. Their abilities emphasize fear masks, disguise, and influence through presence.
void: Embodies nothingness, entropic hunger, and cosmic erasure. Void users remove matter, energy, or concepts entirely. Their abilities emphasize nullification, anti-magic, and consuming void fields.
